text: Mark Williams (born 22 August 1959) is an English actor, comedian, presenter and screenwriter. He is known for his roles as Arthur Weasley in seven of the Harry Potter movies and as the main character in the BBC series Father Brown. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:English stage actors Category:English radio actors Category:English screenwriters Category:English television presenters Category:English comedians Category:Actors from Worcestershire
title: Mark Williams (actor)
